text: Stars and Stripes Forever is a 1952 American biographical movie directed by Henry Koster and was based on the autobiographical novel by John Philip Sousa. It stars Clifton Webb, Debra Paget, Robert Wagner, Ruth Hessey, Roy Roberts, Finlay Currie, Lester Matthews and was distributed by 20th Century Fox. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1952 movies Category:1950s biographical movies Category:American biographical movies Category:Movies based on books Category:20th Century Fox movies Category:Movies directed by Henry Koster
title: Stars and Stripes Forever (movie)
